text: [Time to confuse her!] If you think we're wax-works, you ought to pay, you know. Wax-works weren't made to be looked at for nothing. Nohow!
[She's thinking about the rhyme!] I know what you're thinking about, but it isn't so, nohow.
[I won't fall for that!] Nohow! (shuts his mouth with a snap)
